title: To establish the Commission on Women's Business Ownership.
content: Women's Business Ownership Act of 2008 - Establishes the Commission on Women's Business Ownership to review and make recommendations concerning: (1) the status of women business owners nationwide, and the progress made since the 1980 White House Conference on Small Business. (2) the role of the federal government in aid to and promotion of women business owners. And (3) data collection procedures with regard to women-owned businesses and federal initiatives and procurement.
